title: The AFC Westing Game
description:
Mina and Nate Tice of The Athletic discuss Aaron Rodgers reporting to training camp and then preview the AFC West- What kind of offense will the Chargers run with Joe Lombardi (10:00)? Can the Raiders make up for a shaky secondary (27:02)? Does Patrick Mahomes mask all of Kansas City's holes on defense (44:40)? And is it all about the QB for the Broncos (58:37)?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
